original: MALMROS, Jarl Vilhelm, Skeppsredare, Trelleborg, f Tbg 6/4 97 av v. hdshövd F M o Gunborg Collin, gm Aasne Tången. Hal, hdlsinst, prakt å sv skeppsmäkl.kont 15—19, språk- o yrkesstud USA, Engl o Tyskl 19—21. V. vkst dir Tbgs ångf nya AB 22—30, vkst dir sed. 31, d:o Sv Hamb linien sed. 28. Styr.led i dessa AB samt Tbgs ångkvarns AB, Tbg stenkols AB, Tbg stads sparbk, Nord trsp & sped AB, Kockums mek verkst AB, AB kvarnintress :r, Brand- & lifförs.AB Skåne, Sjöförs.AB Öresund, AB Kolkomp, Sk bkns huv.kont Malmö (ordf dess Tbgkont), Häl-singb Jacquardväfv.AB, Sydsv ömsesid ångf.-förs.AB, Sv redarefrn, Sv allm sjöf.frn, Sthlm, flm Sk hdlskamm. Ag Askenäs säteri, Göte-ryd. Dansk v.kons sed. 35. RVO. Hobbies: Kreaturs- o hästuppfödn.
translated: MALMROS, Jarl Vilhelm, Shipowner, Trelleborg, born in Trelleborg on April 6, 1897, son of the late headmaster F M and Gunborg Collin, married to Aasne Tången. Completed half of commerce school, practical training at a shipping brokerage firm from 1915 to 1919, language and professional studies in the USA, England, and Germany from 1919 to 1921. Became Deputy Managing Director of Tbgs new steamship company from 1922 to 1930, and then promoted to Managing Director from 1931 onwards. Also served as a Managing Director of Sv Hamb linien from 1928. Board member of these companies as well as Tbgs steam mill company, Trelleborg coal company, Trelleborg city savings bank, Nord transportation & forwarding company, Kockums mechanical workshops company, mill interest company, Fire and Life Assurance company Skåne, Maritime Insurance company Öresund, Coal company partnership, Bank's main office in Malmö (chairman of its Trelleborg branch), Häl-singb Jacquard weaving company, South Swedish mutual steamship insurance company, Swedish shipowners association, Swedish general maritime federation, Stockholm, Film Skane trade chamber. Owns Askenäs Manor in Göteryd. Appointed Danish Honorary Vice Consul from 1935. Royal Victorian Order. Hobbies: Cattle and horse breeding.
